abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Paepalanthus Mart.", "TaxonKey is Paepalanthus Kunth, 1841", "TaxonKey is Cladocaulon Gardner" ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbarium (UNA) 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 1 records from MGC Herbarium of University of Malaga (Spain): MGC-Cormof dataset 1 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 1 records from HCDAL - Herbário Caririense Dárdano de Andrade-Lima 1 records from University of South Florida Herbarium (USF) 1 records from Questagame weekly feed 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from Colección de Poales del Museo Botánico CORD - IMBIV 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from SANT Herbarium vascular plants collection 1 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Economic Botany Collection Specimens 1 records from Checklist of aquatic and marshy Monocotyledons from the Araguaia River basin, Brazilian Cerrado 1 records from Gothenburg Herbarium - Types (GBIF:IH:GB:Herbarium) 1 records from HPBR - Herbário Padre Balduino Rambo 1 records from LUSC - Herbário de Lages da Universidade do Estado de Santa Catarina 1 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 2 records from HPAN - Herbário do Pantanal "Vali Joana Pott" 2 records from Natural History Museum, University of Tartu 2 records from RSA - Rancho Santa Ana Botanic Garden Herbarium 2 records from HUCPE - Herbário da Universidade Católica de Pernambuco 2 records from Colección de Herbario 2 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 2 records from UFACPZ - Herbário da Universidade Federal do Acre 2 records from SLUI - Herbário Rosa Mochel 2 records from University of Vienna, Institute for Botany - Herbarium WU 2 records from HAMAB - Herbário Amapaense 2 records from HUSC - Herbário Unisanta 3 records from Colección de plantas vasculares del herbario de la Universitat de València (VAL) 3 records from Colección de plantas vasculares de Brasil del Herbario "Jaime Andrés Rodríguez".
